tool_description: Search and download Acestream live content IDs, and create m3u playlists to run on the Acestream Engine app.
name: Acestream API
title: Acestream API

api_list.name: Set myConfig
api_list.description: Sets your host and port variables that shall be used for building your M3U files
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://acestream-api.p.rapidapi.com/raconfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acestream-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://acestream-api.p.rapidapi.com/raconfig"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "acestream-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
